mapper.select: select user_seq, user_name from users where user_seq in (select user_seq1 from user_friend where user_seq2 = #{mySeq}) or user_seq in (select user_seq2 from user_friend where user_seq1 = #{mySeq})
mapper.delete: delete from user_friend where (user_seq1 = #{mySeq} and user_seq2 = #{friendSeq}) or (user_seq2 = #{mySeq} and user_seq1 = #{friendSeq})
